name: Nacho, Buffalo & Cheddar Chicken Dip
description: This dip brings the heat and just might be the best buffalo chicken dip recipe ever! Perfect for game day or long weekends, just make sure to have beers or pitchers of iced tea on standby.

ingredients.name: Southwest Ranch Dressing Mix or Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
Cajun Fries Seasoning or Buffalo Seasoning

preparation: In Multipurpose Steamer, soften cream cheese in microwave for 30 seconds.
Add all remaining ingredients and stir well.
Transfer into a large baker and bake in oven for 20 min or until bubbly.

products.name: Nacho Cheese Dip Mix
summary: A delicious blend of bold chili with real Parmesan makes for a creamy nacho cheese dip or seasoning.

products.name: Southwest Ranch Dressing Mix
summary: A smoky dressing mix infused with mildly spicy chipotle and classic tangy ranch. Only 3 ingredients needed— mayo, sour cream, and  milk.

products.name: Creamy Ranch Dip Mix
summary: Go beyond your classic ranch dressing and create spreads, dips, or seasonings with this versatile blend!

products.name: Cajun Fries Seasoning
summary: We love to make our taste buds dance with this Cajun Fries Seasoning. This blend of premium herbs and spices creates an earthy, piquant flavour that tastes great and packs a punch. It's perfect for anyone who wants to add excitement and heat to their favourite snack. Sprinkle as much or as little as you like over your spuds for a healthy alternative to restaurant fries with added seasonings.

products.name: Buffalo Seasoning (1011492)
summary: Feel the heat with this low-sodium, spicy blend that goes way beyond wings!

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.
